metadata.Title: CVE-2015-0328 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Adobe Flash Player before 13.0.0.269 and 14.x through 16.x before 16.0.0.305 on Windows and OS X and before 11.2.202.442 on Linux allows attackers to cause a denial of service (NULL pointer dereference) or possibly have unspecified other impact via unknown vectors, a different vulnerability than CVE-2015-0325 and CVE-2015-0326.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-0328` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

flashplugin-downloader - 11.2.202.442ubuntu0.14.04.1
flashplugin-installer - 11.2.202.442ubuntu0.14.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: flashplugin-nonfree package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '11.2.202.442ubuntu0.14.04.1').
